DOC.brief_summary: Comparison Sonographic Cervical Length Bishop Score Preinduction Cervical Assessment prior induction labor regard induction success .
DOC.brief_title: Cervical Length Bishop Score Preinduction Cervical Assessment Prior Induction Labor
DOC.detailed_description: Type study : assessment accuracy diagnostic test . Study setting : The study perform Ain Shams university Maternity hospital nulliparous woman term admit causality induction labor . Study population : The study hold 200 woman primigravida 37-42 week gestation induction labor carry casualty Ain Shams University Maternity Hospital . All patient cervical assessment modify Bishop score cervical length measurement ultrasound . Plan induction labor : - Detailed careful history take participant follow : 1 . Personal history : include name , age , occupation , residence special habit medical importance . 2 . Obstetric history : include gestational age regular antenatal care . 3 . Past history : include medical disorder e.g Diabetes mellitus , hypertension surgical procedure . 4 . History present pregnancy : duration pregnancy last menstrual period , complication occur medication use pregnancy . - Examination participant : 1 . General examination : level consciousness , vital data , complexion . 2 . Abdominal examination : fundal level , lie fetus , detection uterine contraction fetal heart rate . 3 . Pelvic Examination : presenting part , presence rupture membrane cervical assessment regard cervical dilation , effacement , station present part calculate modify Bishop Score . - Investigations : complete blood count , blood group , non stress test . - All woman trans-vaginal ultrasound sound assessment cervical length . - Protocol trans-vaginal ultrasound follow : 1 . Patient ask void . 2 . Vaginal probe insert use direct visualization . 3 . Identification bladder fetal present part . 4 . Identification abnormal finding placenta previa absence fetal heart motion . 5 . Identification mid-line sagittal plane cervix look proximal one third image internal cervical o pull back probe light touch provide good image cervical canal move probe slightly get best long axis cervix measure cervical length three time place caliber appropriately record distance internal external o last recording measurement best image . - If cervical length assess trans-vaginal ultrasound less 28 mm modify Bishop Value less 7 , patient receive 3mg prostaglandin E2 pre-induction cervical ripening repeat 6 hour maximum 2 dos . If failed cervical ripening , Cesarean section do . - All Patients test antepartum fetal heart monitoring `` Non stress test '' .This consider reactive two fetal heart rate acceleration peak least 15 beats/min baseline last 15 second baseline , within 20 minute period , without fetal movement felt mother . A non-reactive trace one without sufficient fetal heart rate acceleration 40 minute period . Any patient non-reassuring non stress test exclude . - Successful induction define vaginal delivery within 24 hour . - Failed induction 24 hour indicate low segment cesarean section . Failed induction define inability achieve active phase labor correspond cervical dilatation â‰¥4 cm within 12 hour initiate oxytocin . Failure progress define cervical dilatation active phase labor least 2 hour descent fetal head second stage labor least 1 hour despite adequate uterine contraction . This consider indication cesarean delivery . - No induction agent give uterine contraction reach frequency three ten minute last 30-60 second cervical change . Amniotomy oxytocin augmentation begin cervical dilation become > 3 cm . - Oxytocin infusion prepare place 5 IU ampoule 500 ml Ringer Saline achieve concentration 10 ml\minute . - The rate infusion start rate 5 miu/ml ( 10 drop per minute ) increase increment every 20 minute accord uterine contraction . - When patient become active phase labor , vaginal examination repeat every 1-2 hour know rate cervical dilation . - If patient request pain relieve , epidural analgesia use . - Fetal heart rate record every half hour . - Labor progress plot partogram .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Nulliparous patient . 2 . Singleton pregnancy . 3 . Living fetus cephalic presentation . 4 . Absence labor pain . 5 . Gestational age 3742 week . 6 . No previous uterine surgical procedure . 7 . No Liquor abnormality . 8 . Fetal weight le 4 kilogram . 1 . Nonvertex presentation . 2 . Previous uterine surgery . 3 . Multiple pregnancy . 4 . Fetal maternal complication might cause cesarean section . 5 . Liquor abnormality . 6 . Fetal weight 4 kilogram . 7 . Abnormal umbilical artery Doppler indices nonstress test . 8 . Asthmatic patient woman allergy prostaglandin .
